title: Passports and visa documents
dataVerified: Full name, DOB, nationality, photo, biometrics, travel history
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Document status (valid/expired/revoked). Link to issuing country system (border control and authorized parties, requires authentication)
rationale: Hotel clerks/police/border agents verify authenticity. Machine-readable zone + OCR-to-hash complement each other. Prevents fake passports. Uses SHA-512 to prevent brute-force enumeration.
